Hero.title: About KrakenHosting
Hero.description: KrakenHosting has gradually evolved into a leading player in offshore web hosting. By collaborating closely with industry-leading partners, we ensure our customers always have access to the most cutting-edge technology in the web hosting industry.

Mission.title: Our Mission: Protection And Peace Of Mind
Mission.description: Our core philosophy is built on providing the highest possible level of protection to all our offshore customers. We prioritize identity protection, server security, and network protection in every aspect of our products and services.

Support.title: 24/7 Expert Support, 365 Days A Year
Support.description: Through our 24/7 Managed Services program we deliver professional, expert-level support for all emergency situations.

cards.title: Real Support Operators
cards.description: Instant access to real engineers—no bots, no queues.

cards.title: Ticketing System
cards.description: Track every request from open to resolution in real time.

cards.title: Live Chat
cards.description: Get instant answers from our support agents directly via our Live Chat.

cards.title: 2500+ Clients
cards.description: More than 2500 customers worldwide trust KrakenHosting for secure offshore hosting services.

cards.title: 8 Global Datacenters
cards.description: Eight worldwide data centers delivering high availability, redundancy, and performance.

cards.title: 99.9% Uptime SLA
cards.description: Guaranteed uptime with service level agreement — reliable infrastructure ensuring your services stay online.

Infrastructure.title: KrakenHosting Global Infrastructure
Infrastructure.description: Operating from eight global data centers—a number that is continuously growing—KrakenHosting offers unparalleled choice and redundancy for your business.

CTA.title: Let’s Secure Your Infrastructure
CTA.description: KrakenHosting does not just deliver hosting; we deliver a reliable, secure, and globally redundant platform for your business success.
